title: Furniture Web Page
description_pt: Landing page de e-commerce para móveis com design responsivo e foco na experiência mobile.
description_en: E-commerce landing page for furniture with a responsive design and strong focus on mobile user experience.

title: Daily Coffee
description_pt: Site de cafeteria com layout moderno e responsivo, destacando produtos e promoções diárias.
description_en: Coffee shop website with a modern and responsive layout, highlighting products and daily promotions.

title: Kanban
description_pt: Sistema de organização de tarefas estilo Kanban com colunas dinâmicas e arrastar e soltar.
description_en: Kanban-style task management system with dynamic columns and drag-and-drop functionality.

title: React Books
description_pt: Busca de livros usando a API do Google Books com modal de informações do livro.
description_en: Book search application using the Google Books API, featuring a modal with detailed book information.

title: Carros Search
description_pt: Ferramenta de busca de carros com filtros e integração com APIs para exibir modelos e preços.
description_en: Car search tool with filters and API integration to display vehicle models and prices.

title: Cronômetro
description_pt: Aplicação de cronômetro simples com controle de tempo e interface amigável.
description_en: Simple stopwatch application with time controls and a user-friendly interface.

title: Notes React
description_pt: Aplicativo de anotações feito em React, com suporte para edição, exclusão e armazenamento local.
description_en: Notes application built with React, featuring edit, delete, and local storage support.

title: Form MultiStep
description_pt: Formulário multietapas com validação e navegação entre os passos.
description_en: Multi-step form with validation and step-by-step navigation.

title: Astroxz Designer
description_pt: Portfólio criativo com foco em design e desenvolvimento visual.
description_en: Creative portfolio focused on design and visual development.

title: Tickets API
description_pt: API para gerenciamento de tickets e chamados de suporte.
description_en: API for managing support tickets and help desk requests.

title: Soundify
description_pt: Plataforma de e-commerce completa com carrinho de compras, autenticação e pagamentos.
description_en: Full-featured e-commerce platform with shopping cart, authentication, and payment integration.

title: App Dietas
description_pt: Aplicativo que utiliza Inteligência Artificial para gerar planos alimentares personalizados.
description_en: Application that uses Artificial Intelligence to generate personalized diet plans.

title: Web Host Landing Page
description_pt: Landing page para serviço de hospedagem web.
description_en: Landing page for a web hosting service focused on clarity and conversion.

title: Encurtador de URL
description_pt: Sistema de encurtamento de URLs com QR Code, expiração personalizada e dashboard.
description_en: URL shortening system with QR code generation, custom expiration, and a management dashboard.

title: Nexa System
description_pt: Sistema para gerenciamento de tickets e chamados de suporte.
description_en: System for managing support tickets and help desk requests.

title: Food Delivery
description_pt: Aplicação simples e responsiva para pedidos de comida, com foco em usabilidade.
description_en: Simple and responsive food ordering application focused on usability.
